Package org.apache.orc.impl

Class PhysicalFsWriter.VariantTracker

java.lang.Object
org.apache.orc.impl.PhysicalFsWriter.VariantTracker
Enclosing class:
PhysicalFsWriter
protected static class PhysicalFsWriter.VariantTracker extends Object
Record the information about each column encryption variant. The unencrypted data and each encrypted column root are variants.

      Returns:
